column5: Any suggestions on where to get bait in the Gilford / Lefroy area?
89&Yonge or the end of Gilford road
what peterc said INNISFIL BAIT& TACKLE s/w corner of 89 & yonge st $5 a scoop (60-70 minnows) open 6am 7 days a week  Dann
$5 if you have your own bucket $6 if you get a bag/oxygen from him
x3 (or is it 4?) on Hwy 89/Yonge.  Keith is the man!!!!
That's a GREAT price for minnows....here we have to get certified minnows at $7 per 4 dozen and they are NOT emerald shiners that we really want...  This year I hope to dip my own minnows.
Thanks guys! Now I just to figure out how to keep my minnows from freezing up.
I usually keep my worms in my mouth to keep them from freezing...it should work for minnows just try to keep the whole breath swallow separate....   Art
